channel.title: Creating Server
channel.description:
Hello, I am bored of looking for servers to join, and working alone on my private server projects. So, I am trying to recruit people the partner up with me for making a good private server. I dont need any proof or whatever, but I do want a partner(s) who will commit to this server and help me make it at its best. You can contact me by chatting with me on AIM; my account is Aydem12. If you can't use AIM just pm me and we will figure out something there.
Thanks for reading, and I hope to see some people join me. :)

i will gladly help u out with your new server.

Read full topic
